description: So tonight is the big party the Marcus Mojo has been waiting for: 'An Evening of Sin'. Nothing is going to keep him from being there. That is, something comes up. It seems his ride to the party, Connor Maguire, has a pretty big problem rising. A problem that is too hard to solve on his own. So not being a man who gets what he wants, Marcus comes up with a solution, and the two of them come to the conclusion that two heads are definitely better than one.Enjoy!
title: Help Me Off!
